title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 487.1 - Actions to collect taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 487.1 - Actions to collect taxes

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 511(1), (2)

An action may be brought at any time by the Attorney

General in the name of the State of New York, at the request of the State Tax

Commission, to recover the amount of tax, interest or penalties due under
article 21 of the Tax Law or a warrant may be issued by the Tax Commission to
the sheriff or a warrant agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
487.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
